warnings.warning_message: Safety and efficacy have not been established in patients younger than 18 years.
Patients should avoid drinking alcohol or taking other drugs that may cause sleepiness or dizziness while taking this drug until they talk to their healthcare provider.

Contraindicated in patients allergic to penicillin.
Accidental ingestion of just 1 dose can result in a fatal overdose of morphine.
dosing errors due to confusion between mg and mL, and other morphine sulfate Oral Solutions of different concentrations can result in accidental overdose and death.
Oxycodone can slow or stop patient's breathing
Safety and efficacy of betamethasone dipropionate have not been established in patients younger than 12 years.
